text: To be eligible for historic property tax relief, real property must be a historic building designated by the Joint Committee on Landmarks of the National Capital and, in addition, must be approved by the Mayor under § 47- 844.
historical:

1981 Ed., § 47-843.

1973 Ed., § 47-653.

DC CODE § 47-843

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Real Property Assessment and Tax. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Authority and Procedure to Establish Real Property Tax Rates.
